mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of American Legion National Commander John Davis receiving an award
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Two unidentified members of the American Legion presenting National Commander John E. Davis with an award at the American Legion Banquet and Dance held at Pleasant Valley Country Club in Weirton, W.Va.
